items.sentence: Tom called the office to say that he\'d be late.
Tom hasn\'t eaten anything in the past 36 hours.
Tom hasn\'t yet told us what he wants us to buy.
The moment she was alone, she opened the letter.
I wouldn\'t want to do anything against the law.
I know we can\'t count on Tom to do that for us.
About how long do you think the meeting will be?
I\'ll never forget the last time that I met Tom.
Tom noticed Mary the moment he entered the room.
Tom practices the piano about three hours a day.
